diffPolicyMib.name: diffPolicyMib
diffPolicyMib.contactinfo: SNMPCONF Working Group http://www.ietf.org/html.charters/snmpconf-charter.html Editors: Harrie Hazewinkel Postal: Covalent Technologies 706 Mission Street (2nd floor) San Francisco, CA - 94133 United States Tel: +1 415 536 5221 E-mail: harrie@covalent.net David Partain Postal: Ericsson Radio Systems P.O. Box 1248 SE-581 12 Linkoping Sweden Tel: +46 13 28 41 44 E-mail: David.Partain@ericsson.com
diffPolicyMib.description: This MIB module contains differentiated services specific managed objects to perform policy-based configuration management. This MIB allows policies to use 'templates' to be used to instantiate diffserv datapath configurations to be assigned (associated with an interface and direction) when a policy is created and activated.

diffPolicyDPCUnique.name: diffPolicyDPCUnique
diffPolicyDPCUnique.description: The diffPolicyDPCUnique object yields a unique new value for diffPolicyDPCId when read and subsequently set. This value must be tested for uniqueness.

diffPolicyDPCTable.name: diffPolicyDPCTable
diffPolicyDPCTable.description: A table which defines the various per-hop-behaviors for which the system has default 'templates'.

diffPolicyDPCEntry.name: diffPolicyDPCEntry
diffPolicyDPCEntry.description: An entry defining a per-hop-behavior. Each entry in this table combines the various parameters (entries) into a specific per-hop-behavior. Entries in this table might be defined by a vendor (pre-configured) or defined by a management application.

diffPolicyDPCId.name: diffPolicyDPCId
diffPolicyDPCId.description: A unique id for the per-hop-behavior policy.

diffPolicyDPCDescr.name: diffPolicyDPCDescr
diffPolicyDPCDescr.description: A human-readable description to identify this defined per-hop-behavior. Note that this is an SnmpAdminString, which permits UTF-8 strings.

diffPolicyDPCOwner.name: diffPolicyDPCOwner
diffPolicyDPCOwner.description: The owner who created this entry.

diffPolicyDPCLastChange.name: diffPolicyDPCLastChange
diffPolicyDPCLastChange.description: The date and time when this entry was last changed.

diffPolicyDPCConfiguration.name: diffPolicyDPCConfiguration
diffPolicyDPCConfiguration.description: The pointer to a datapath configuration template as set up in the DIFFSERV-MIB. This RowPointer should point to an instance of one of: diffServClfrElementEntry diffServClfrEntry diffServMeterEntry diffServActionEntry diffServAlgDropEntry diffServQEntry A value of zeroDotZero in this attribute indicates no further Diffserv treatment is performed on traffic of this datapath. If the row pointed to does not exist, the treatment is as if this attribute contains a value of zero- DotZero.

diffPolicyDPCStatus.name: diffPolicyDPCStatus
diffPolicyDPCStatus.description: RowStatus object used for creation and deletion of rows in this table.

diffPolicyMIBFullCompliance.name: diffPolicyMIBFullCompliance
diffPolicyMIBFullCompliance.description: The full compliance for this MIB module.

diffPolicyMIBDPCGroup.name: diffPolicyMIBDPCGroup
diffPolicyMIBDPCGroup.description: The per-hop-behavior Group defines the MIB Objects that describe the configuration template for the per-hop-behavior.
